name: Prototype: The Last Trees
description:
The Last Trees is my entry for My First Game Jam - Summer 2022

The city is very polluted, you need to plant the last trees on earth to try to save it. Your health decreases every second so you have to think fast about how to get to the soil to plant each tree.

Controllers: Use the arrow keys to move

Credits:

  • Font
  • Start button
  • Main Ambient Sound
  • Health pick-up sound
  • Explosion Sound
